title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.

OB: (Observed Behavior)

EB: (Expected Behavior)
Change the label content and verify that its height adjusts accordingly with the font size.

SR: (Steps to Reproduce)
1. Open the application where the label is present.
2. Find the label that needs its font size modified.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height remains the same and does not adjust according to the font size.
5. Change the label content.
6. Confirm that the label height now properly adjusts to match the font size.
